title: needing any and all t210-3 orange borders...list of tradebait attached
author: Archive

posts.post_title: needing any and all t210-3 orange borders...list of tradebait attached
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

I have a few of these at this point but I still have a long way to go. I'll take the card no matter how bad the condition is and I'll put up any card listed below in trade if it brings a t210 orange border in return. Thanks in advance,

Brian
redmaccie@hotmail.com



c46 Complete Set of 90
d311 group of 30
t204 Archer PSA 1 - faint wrinkling....tough common to find
t205 Leach PSA AUT [Broadleaf back] - torn corner, otherwise very nice
t207 Fromme VG+ - mostly sharp corners, no wrinkling
t207 Gainor VG/EX - mostly sharp corners, no wrinkling
t207 Kuhn PR - left/right borders trimmed...surface scrapes on front, back damage...lowest pop reports in set!! [BROADLEAF BACK]
t207 Lively EX - mostly sharp corners, no wrinkling
t207 Milan FR- tiny nick in side, faint wrinkle
t207 Schaefer VG - offcentered, sharp corners, no wrinkling
t212-1 1909 Obak Ort (Portland) SGC 40 - slight touches to corners/no creasing
t212-1 1909 Obak Ragan (Oakland) SGC 40 - slight touches to corners/no creasing
t212-1 1909 Obak Smith (LA) SGC AUT - no creasing/little wear
t212-1 1909 Obak Williams (SF) SGC 30 - wrinkle in upper-left/little wear otherwise
t212-1 1909 Obak Browning (SF) SGC 30 - might be nicest card in group - mostly sharp corners, little wear, no wrinkling or creasing
t212-1 1909 Obak Ehman (SAC) SGC 30 - uncatalogued until recently, slight touches to corners/no creasing
t212-1 1909 Obak McCreddie (Portland) SGC AUT - tough MGR card! no creasing/little wear
t212-1 1909 Obak Ornsdorff (LA) SGC AUT - tiny wrinkle in corner, little wear
t210 Hyames Series 7 SGC 30 (no creases)
t210-3 Morris VG - rare HORIZONTAL t210!!
t222 Lee Magee SGC 10 - second toughest card in set
e97 Rossman SGC 10 - notoriously difficult card...very presentable
e97 Hartsel "one L" SGC 40 - Difficult variation, very little wear no creases
e97 Camnitz B&W/PROOF SGC 20
e99 Maggert PSA AUT - lowest POP report in set, tiny pinhole, very little wear
e100 Cutshaw PSA 1 - rounded corners, nice HORIZONTAL POSE, very tough
e101 Bender (blue back variation) FR - tiny wrinkles and "flecks" on surface ...tough variation!!
e102 Wagner (fielding) SGC 10 - creases/corner wear. VERY RARE variation....exceedingly difficult!!
e102 Doyle (batting) SGC 40 - very little wear, no creases, TOUGHEST card in set
e103 Tenny SGC AUT - neat "oversized borders" / handcut card....TOUGHEST card in a brutal set
e103 Wood PR/FR - displayable card...2nd toughest in set after Tenny
e103 Chance SGC 10 - crease across middle w/ smaller wrinkles on sides/corners ....toughest HOFer in set!
1911 Zeenut Heitmuller FR+ - corner crease with wrinkling along right border
1911 Zeenut Halla SGC 20 - VERY DESIREABLE HORIZONTAL POSE.....a must for finishing the set
1911 Zeenut Arlett SGC 80 - Highest graded example known
1911 Zeenut Fitzgerald SGC 30 [on hold]
1912 Zeenut Baker (horizontal) GD+ - two tiny corner creases...awesome pose and VERY difficult!
1912 Zeenut Higginbottom w/ OVERPRINT GD - crease across middle....tough card!
1913 Zeenut McCarl (horizontal) SGC 20 - vertical wrinkling...awesome pose!
m116 AD PANEL of three players including Chance...blue background too. VERY SCARCE
m116 NEAR SET of 19/24 blue background cards - missing Wagner, Cobb, Matty, Lajoie and Chance...most cards in GD-VG range
m116 Zwilling SGC 50 ("300 subjects" back)
v117 group of 12 (incl. Traynor)
w519 Fatty Arbuckle EX
w553 O'Doul GD wrinkling
w572 group of four (Burns, Henline, Johnson, King) FR-GD range
